scene.name: Prelude
scene.directive: This epilogue contains masturbation encouragement.
It also contains light physical activity encouragement.
Participating in both is recommended, but not required, for maximum immersion and enjoyment.
Click to continue.

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: It was shortly after the game had finished; During the strange post-game where everyone got dressed again and prepared to part ways.
Leonie came up to you, almost fully dressed, with a smile on her face.
You know, that offer is still on the table!
If you ever want to train together, I could always use a buddy.
You seem to know what you're doing when it comes to exercise. Maybe I could motivate you to train with me?
I get it if exercise isn't your thing, but maybe you just need a little motivation?
I have to run, but you know where to find me, right?

scene.name: Setup
scene.directive: Some time later, in the land of Fódlan...
Glad you could make it, ~name~! I hope you didn't have trouble getting here.

scene.name: Motivation
scene.directive: Well? Did I catch you off guard?
I thought I would give you some more motivation.
So let's make a deal. You keep doing those stretches, and I'll show you even more. Sound good?
With little hesitation, you comply with her request.
Leonie's motivation is quite persuasive, and you promptly return to doing your basic exercise.
Not bad. Keep going for five more.
Is this really necessary?
Of course it isn't. I just wanted to see you put some effort in.
Really? And you get to just sit there watching?
Tell you what. Do those five more squats for me. Can you manage that? If you can, I'll make it worth your while. Deal?
Hey, this should be easy for you, right? If you can manage five more, I'll make it worth your while. Deal?
You hear the subtle sounds of movement as you act, eyes still closed. And when you finish the squats...
Not bad.
But I think we can drop the pretext now.
